caption.p: List of the plasmids used in this study, their unique lab identifier, lab name, description, PMID of the relevant reference (if available), figure in which they first appear and cognate label in figure legend

tr.td: Mammalian expression bovine trypsinogen signal peptide-FLAGM1 fusion
Bacterial expression of mouse Chac1 C-terminal His-tagged
Bacterial expression mouse Chac1 CtoS (C92S, C169S, C190S, C212S) C-terminal His-tagged
Bacterial expression of E116Q mutant mouse Chac1 C-terminal His-tagged
Mammalian expression of C-term FLAG-tagged mouse ChaC1
Bacterial expression of E116Q cysteine to serine mutant mouse Chac1 C-terminal His-tagged
Mammalian expression of C-term FLAG-tagged mouse ChaC1 E116Q mutant (Cyto-ChaC1_E116Q)
Mammalian expression ER-localised FLAG M1 tagged mouse CHAC1 CtoS (C92S, C169S, C190S, C212S) KDEL
Mammalian expression ER-localised FLAG M1 tagged mouse CHAC1 CtoS (C92S, C169S, C190S, C212S) E116Q KDEL
Mammalian expression ER-localised FLAG M1 tagged mouse CHAC1 KDEL
Mammalian expression ER-localised FLAG M1 tagged mouse CHAC1 mCherry-KDEL, CtoS (C92S, C169S, C190S, C212S)
Bacterial expression of mouse ChaC1-mCherry fusion, C-terminal His-tagged, (C169S, C190S, C212S)
Mammalian expression ER-localised FLAG M1 tagged mouse CHAC1 mCherry-KDEL, CtoS, E116Q
Bacterial expression of mouse ChaC1-mCherry fusion, C-terminal His-tagged, (C169S, C190S, C212S), E116Q
ER localized Grx1 fused to roGFP2 KDEL
Mammalian expression plasmid of human LDL receptor, cytosolic tail tagged with a 3X FLAG tag
Mammalian expression plasmid of null Hong-Kong mutant a1-antitrypsin C-terminally tagged with 3XFLAG
Bacterial expression of Grx1-roGFP2 fusion protein
XBP1 mini-cDNA with Venus fused the post-IRE1 spliced open reading frame
Mammalian expression plasmid encoding human hyperactive ERO1L (ERO1a) and a co-expressed human CD2 FACS marker
